content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
-- PP changing
SELECT
    vendor_name
    , year(trip_pickup_datetime)
    , month(trip_pickup_datetime)
    , count(1) as trips
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://ppsynapsetest.dfs.core.windows.net/nycyellow/*/*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]

GROUP BY     vendor_name
    , year(trip_pickup_datetime)
    , month(trip_pickup_datetime)
